description.value:
Your instructions make it easier for you and your allies to swim through dangerous waters. Signal all squadmates; until the end of your next turn, you and each ally gain a swim Speed of 20 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Naval Training]

Special If you have this tactic prepared, you can use [[/act swim skill=warfare-lore]]{Warfare Lore} in place of Athletics for checks you make to Swim.
